languages.text: Теплоотводная труба нагревает воздух до жара. Это — самая теплая часть отсека, куда рабочие стащили лежаки.
The heat sink warms the air around it to a scorching temperature. This is the warmest part of the bay — the workers have even dragged deck chairs here.
languages.original_text: Теплоотводная труба нагревает воздух до жара. Это — самая теплая часть отсека, куда рабочие стащили лежаки.

traits.locale_text: The heat sink warms the air around it to a scorching temperature. This is the warmest part of the bay — the workers have even dragged deck chairs here.
The heat sink warms the air around it to a scorching temperature. This is the warmest part of the bay — the workers have even dragged deck chairs here.
The heat sink warms the air around it to a scorching temperature. This is the warmest part of the bay — the workers have even dragged deck chairs here.
The heat sink warms the air around it to a scorching temperature. This is the warmest part of the bay — the workers have even dragged deck chairs here.

languages.text: 散热器周围散发着灼人的空气。这里是整片甲板最温暖的地方，工人们甚至把躺椅都拖了过来。
languages.original_text: The heat sink warms the air around it to a scorching temperature. This is the warmest part of the bay — the workers have even dragged deck chairs here.

traits.locale_text: 散热器周围散发着灼人的空气。这里是整片甲板最温暖的地方，工人们甚至把躺椅都拖了过来。

languages.text: El disipador térmico calienta el aire que lo rodea a temperaturas abrasadoras. Es el lugar más caluroso de la bahía: algunos trabajadores emprendedores han traído tumbonas y todo.
languages.original_text: The heat sink warms the air around it to a scorching temperature. This is the warmest part of the bay — the workers have even dragged deck chairs here.

traits.locale_text: El disipador térmico calienta el aire que lo rodea a temperaturas abrasadoras. Es el lugar más caluroso de la bahía: algunos trabajadores emprendedores han traído tumbonas y todo.

languages.text: ヒートシンクは周囲の空気を灼熱の温度に温める。ここは、ベイでも最も暑い場所だ…作業員たちが、デッキチェアをここに引きずってきたほどに。
languages.original_text: The heat sink warms the air around it to a scorching temperature. This is the warmest part of the bay — the workers have even dragged deck chairs here.

traits.locale_text: ヒートシンクは周囲の空気を灼熱の温度に温める。ここは、ベイでも最も暑い場所だ…作業員たちが、デッキチェアをここに引きずってきたほどに。

languages.text: Der Wärmeableiter erhitzt die Luft in der Umgebung bis ins Unerträgliche. Das hier ist der wärmste Teil der Bucht, die Arbeiter haben sogar Liegestühle hergeschleppt.
languages.original_text: The heat sink warms the air around it to a scorching temperature. This is the warmest part of the bay — the workers have even dragged deck chairs here.

traits.locale_text: Der Wärmeableiter erhitzt die Luft in der Umgebung bis ins Unerträgliche. Das hier ist der wärmste Teil der Bucht, die Arbeiter haben sogar Liegestühle hergeschleppt.

languages.text: Le dissipateur thermique diffuse une chaleur accablante. C'est la partie la mieux chauffée du compartiment, et les ouvriers y ont même installé des chaises longues.
languages.original_text: The heat sink warms the air around it to a scorching temperature. This is the warmest part of the bay — the workers have even dragged deck chairs here.

traits.locale_text: Le dissipateur thermique diffuse une chaleur accablante. C'est la partie la mieux chauffée du compartiment, et les ouvriers y ont même installé des chaises longues.

languages.text: Soğutma bloku, etrafındaki havayı yakıp kavuruyor. Bölmenin en sıcak kısmı burası. İşçiler buraya sandalye bile getirmiş.
languages.original_text: The heat sink warms the air around it to a scorching temperature. This is the warmest part of the bay — the workers have even dragged deck chairs here.

traits.locale_text: Soğutma bloğu, etrafındaki havayı yakıp kavuruyor. Bölmenin en sıcak kısmı burası. İşçiler buraya sandalye bile getirmiş.
